text: What's one thing you're genuinely excited about for the future?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years? 10 years?
What's a skill you hope to learn or master in the future?
What's a societal change you hope to see in your lifetime?
If you could get a glimpse of one future event, what would it be?
What's a personal goal you're working towards for the future?
What's a piece of technology you predict will be commonplace in 20 years?
What kind of ancestor do you hope to be remembered as?
What's a place you dream of visiting or living in one day?
What's one habit you want to cultivate for a better future self?
What's a world problem you hope will be solved in the next 50 years?
What advice would your future self give to your current self?
What's a new experience you want to have in the coming year?
How do you envision your ideal retirement?
What's a trend you think will define the next decade?
What's a book you plan to read or a movie you plan to watch in the near future?
What's a positive impact you hope to make on your community in the future?
What's one thing you're doing now to prepare for your future goals?
If you could write a letter to your future self, what's one question you'd ask?
What's a hope you have for the world your children or future generations will inherit?
